titleStmt.title: A speech delivered in Parliament concerning the evill consequences that doe attend this state by committing places of trust into the hands of court-favourites wherby it doth plainly appear to be the originall of all publick grievances and combustions of this kingdom / By Sir D. D. Knight.
titleStmt.author: Digges, Dudley, Sir, 1583-1639.

notesStmt.note: On the occasion of the impeachment of George Villiers, Duke of Buckingham in 1626. cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
